text: cea ca hen brrda phu xthrrm pen phu hwan klaw neuxngcak sing thi phwk khea khwnkhway xea wi læa man ca txng keid khun kæ phwk khea swn brrda phu sraththa læa ptibati khwam di tang «ca xyu nı xuthyan hæng swn swrrkh sahrab phwk khea ca di sing thi phwk khea prarthna n thi phracea khxng phwk cea nan khux khwam pordpran xan ying hıy
